scripts.deploy: npm run build && cdk deploy --require-approval never
scripts.dashboard: aws ssm start-session --target $(npm run -s instance-id) --document-name AWS-StartPortForwardingSession --parameters 'portNumber=18789,localPortNumber=18789'
scripts.status: aws ssm describe-instance-information --filters 'Key=InstanceIds,Values='$(npm run -s instance-id) --query 'InstanceInformationList[0].[InstanceId,PingStatus,PlatformName,PlatformVersion]' --output table
scripts.logs: aws ec2 get-console-output --instance-id $(npm run -s instance-id) --output text
